item.title: Making Specific Area teleblock?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you were teleblocked and were using this code for leaving:

//leaving if(itemID == 1111 && objectID == 2222) { if(teleblock == true) { sendMessage("You are teleblocked!"); } else { code here } }

Very sloppy code, I wrote it quickly. But that is checking if you were teleblocked. If you didn’t want it to check:

//leaving if(itemID == 1111 && objectID == 2222) { code here }

Read full topic

item.title: Making Specific Area teleblock?

@chassy13 wrote:

Well, you already have a teleblock boolean right?

Just add in the method you are using:

teleblock = true;

or whatever your variable is.

item.title: Making Specific Area teleblock?
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I want to make it to where when you end the kalpite lair you can not teleport out
so i added this

public boolean kq_lair() { if ((absX >= 3517 && absX <= 3460 && absY >= 9474 && absY <= 9530) //Level1 || (absX >= 3508 && absX <= 3486 && absY >= 9481 && absY <= 9494)) { //Level2 return true; } else { return false; } }

if (kq_lair()) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("You the Rope to Exit"); } }

I dont think i did it right can someone help me?
P.S. I know there in the correct place as i am not stupid/nub

Read full topic
